G2089.def: extension of time up to and beyond an expected point

G2596.def: extension to a goal, normally down

G5236.def: a degree which exceeds extraordinarily a point on an implied or overt scale of extent{N:001}

G3598.def: a general term for a thoroughfare, either within a population center or between two such centers
